Description: Student repeatedly talks back, fights, hits or argues with peers and teachers and does not stop even when asked repeatedly. Student is sent out of the class for 5-10 minutes by the teacher
Student has to be reminded at least twice by name to respect his peers and/or pay attention to the teacher
Student has to be reminded once by name to respect his peers and/or pay attention to the teacher
Student respects/pays attention to the teacher, but bothers his peers, or vice versa (with no comments/prompts by teacher)
Student works well with others and no teacher intervention is needed
Student actively encourages others to pay attention and improve their behavior
Student actively becomes a role model of exceptional, respectful behavior to the others
